title: The Butterfly Effect and Paradoxes of Account Abstraction in the DeFi Ecosystem
description:
gm, I'd talk about the **butterfly effects** and **paradoxes** of account abstraction (AA).

Discuss the cascading impacts on AA in DeFi;
* Accessibility
* Collaborative DeFi
* Unlocking advanced wallet features

I'll discuss the paradoxes of AA;
* Simplicity vs Complexity
* Security vs Convenience
* Decentralization vs Usability
* Customization vs Standardization
* Innovation vs Stability

(+) with real world onchain examples, relevant EIPs/ERCs, benchmarking AA with performance insights.

LFG
